question: A fossil discovered in Colorado dates from the early Mesozoic Era. A year later a similar fossil is found in Wyoming that also dates from the early Mesozoic Era. These two organisms most likely lived in
candidate_answers: (A) the same environment at about the same time. (B) the same environment at different times. (C) different environments at about the same time. (D) different environments at different times.
answer: different environments at about the same time.
label: C
